msbt.message: You loving the island life? I saw you all over the place yesterday! What were you up to? Running errands?Or were you just cruising around, taking in all the fabtastical vistas?That sounds nice. Everything about this place is picture-perfect, after all. Including me!
You were fishing a whole bunch yesterday, right? Could you maybe give me some fishing tips later?I'm squigged out by fish bait, so I stand by the river and sing but the fish always swim away.
I saw you hauling around a net yesterday, .I'm le totes confident in my mad bug- catching skillsbut I'd still like to trade tips sometime, !

I heard you were picking up shells all day yesterday. Did you find any pretty ones?Using shells for DIY stuff is pretty great, but I low-key prefer holding on to the pretty ones.After a week, I whisper my secret thoughts to them. Then, that night, I throw them back into the sea.
I saw you digging up clams yesterday. Is there a fish you're trying to catch?Or are you questioning them? what do the clams know?What are the clams not telling us?!
Folks are saying you popped a bunch of sky balloons yesterday.<10_4 /> How do you hit something so small?!Every time I get out my slingshot, I swear those balloons start laughing at me, .
The shooting stars last night were sooo pretty! I heard you were out watching themDid you make a bunch of wishes? Making wishes is what shooting stars are for, !
I totes saw you shaking trees yesterday, .Folks were saying you were shaking them a lot. Were you looking for something? Did you find something?Was it wasps? Did you findwasps?

Yesterday, I heard that sound you only hear when someone's hitting a bunch of trees.It was all<10_10 />WHUD! <10_9 /><10_10 />WHUD! <10_9 /><10_10 />WHUD!<10_9 /><10_4 /> Was that you, ?You must've been prepping for some serious DIY, huh? I can't wait to see what you make, !
Everybody's chatting about how you were chopping down a bunch of trees yesterday! Doesn't chopping that much wood make your arms feel like cold spaghetti noodles?
You totes planted a bunch of green stuff yesterday. That's a fab bit of landscaping, . It looks pretty and brings all the bugs out. Thanks, !
Hey, ! You watered a ton of flowers yesterday. I bet they enjoyed it.Actuallydo flowers enjoy stuff? I guess I've never asked. Time to go chat with some flowers!

I hear you were showing off a lot of Reactions yesterday! It's fun, right?<10_4 /> Boom! I'm like this! <10_4 />Now I'm like this!Then I'm likeandandandand WHEW! I forgot you're supposed to limber up before you do that!
Is it true you bounced off to a bunch of other islands yesterday?I want to travel the world. Or should I sayI want to TOUR the world. As a famous pop star, !
You had company over yesterday? You should've told me! I could have sung and danced for everyone!Give me a ring whenever you need an emergency pop star, !
You were deep in that DIY zone yesterday, right? It was the talk of the island!You must be a master artisan, huh? Did you make a bunch of stuff before you moved here too, ?
I heard you busted a bunch of tools yesterday. I do that all the time!I break them because I'm trying to work them into dance routines. But I bet you were doing actual work.
Where were you at yesterday? Were you hiding indoors?Well, todayyou should chat a bunch with ME! Because I'm still bored from yesterday.
You were outside a bunch yesterday! I'm totes an outdoors .It's where all the best music festivals are!
I'm onto you! I know that you made a lot of holes!But it's kind of exciting too. Every step's an adventure, !
You OK, ? I heard you fell into a bunch of pitfall traps yesterday. Were you falling in on purpose?! No way Ha! Now that I think about it, it sounds kind of fun, !
Did you have your place on shuffle yesterday? I came over, but heard you furniture scooting and bailed.I totes want to see your re-dec once you're done, !
Have you been designing stuff on your phone? What kind of stuff? You KNOW I'm a fan of stuff.You have got to show me when you're done, !
You've been really talkative lately, huh? You're just such a good chatter AND a good listener!You should host a talk show! I should be your first guest. And cohost. And band leader, !
Everyone's going on about how you and were chatty-chat-chatting yesterday. So now WE should chat tons today. Even MORE than you two did! I need the publicity, .
You were chatting with everybody on yesterday! I try to greet everyone every day too.Engaging with your fan base is one of the keys to being a successful pop star, .
Were you OK yesterday? I heard you were stung by wasps a bunch and I got SO worried! Wasps are suuuuuuuch jerks, so be careful out there, 'K?
I heard you got stung by a wasp! I'm sorry! Wasps get scared and lash out if their home falls down.It's hard to run away, but it's kind of your only call, .

Everyone's talking about how you were out fossil hunting yesterday. Did you show Blathers your finds? It's so wild that a bunch of critters used to live on this island. I can't wait to find more of them!
You were hitting a bunch of rocks yesterday, weren't you? I could hear the clanking all day! Did you get anything good? I love it when a pill bug pops out, .
Someone's been burying Bells. Any idea who? Ha! , I totes know it was you! I think maybe they've already sprouted. Pretty quick return on investment, eh, ?

What did you do with all that fruit you picked up yesterday? Fruit legit energizes my creative soul.Life tip! Grab a few hundred , get in a bathtub, and bury yourself in them. Then sing. Or yell. Whichever.Totes relaxing. Totes spiritually centering. And totes delicious to escape from, .

You've had your nose attached to your phone a lot lately. Was there something interesting going on?Or were you just looking to look? I'm legit one of those folks that looks at their phone for no reason.Well, sometimes when I'm having a rough day, I turn on the selfie camera and say, "You're fab! You got this!"It makes me feel all better about everything. Next time you're having a rough day, give it a try, .

I saw you looking at your phone a bunch yesterday. I look at mine a lot too.Sometimes I remember I live on a beautiful island and I want to enjoy the viewbut also my phone.So I turn on the phone's camera and enjoy looking at the island that way, .
Hey! Is it true you were making roads for us yesterday? I love walking on roads.They give you a real feeling of going somewhere. Like, hey. I'm "here" now. Let's go see where "there" is.
Everyone's been talking about how you were making rivers yesterday. Hey. Want me to blow your mind?Riversare just fish roads.I bet your brain's all "ka-boom" right now, !

Hey, , that's a fab cliff you made yesterday! Everyone's been talking about it.Some folks were talking about how it'd be a dramatic place for a final battle with your archenemyOK, I was the only one saying that. But I've been watching a lot of action movies lately, .
What's the deal with touching up all the fences yesterday? Making a few Bells on the side?You did it for free?! Wow, that's nice of you! I'm going to start doing nice stuff too, .
You were moving around the furniture outside yesterday, and it got me wonderingDid you arrange it to be cute? Will it make me cuter if I sit on it?Can I be your cute furniture spokesmodel?
You're doing pretty fab with racking up those Nook Miles, right? Good job!I'm working on my own point totals. I want to use them to buy a recording studio, .
So you were dancing in front of Resident Services, huh? Sounds like somebody paid off their loan!Congrats, !

It's legit NONE of my business, but I'm going to ask anyway because, hi, it's me, .Why have you been at Nook's Cranny so much? I've been avoiding it so I don't buy stuff I don't need.And stuff I don't need is my favorite stuff to buy, !
I heard the new island-tune track you cut, ! That song is an absolute BOP! I totes need you to write ME a song!
You changed the flag design outside of Resident Services? I didn't know we could do that!Your flag's le neato as a mosquito, which is a new saying I just made up since "fab" wasn't fab enough.
I saw that transformation-wand action yesterday. You. Are. WILD!Zappo! New outfit! Zappo! Another outfit! I need to get one of those for my concerts, !
I saw you river hopping yesterday. You're crazy skilled with that vaulting pole, !
'K, I know you bought a bunch of turnips from Daisy Mae yesterday. SoI need some hot turnip tips.I've tried to use them as decorations, but I can't get the glitter to stay on. How about you?
Ohmigosh, ! I heard your turnips sold for a lot! Congrats!I always forget to sell my turnips Heck, I usually forget to buy turnips!

Sometimes I can't chill if I'm not talking. Like now? I'm totes chill. But if I stopped talkingwoooo no good.Anyway, I had no idea you were like that too, ! You've been chatting with everybody lately!I feel you. Sometimes you just have to open your mouth and let your brain do whatever, right? Right!
Hey, do you know where all the weeds went? They were so all over the place yesterday.I'm just kidding, ! I know you picked them. Solid job keeping the island très chic.
Your hair looks different! I loved the old look, but the new look is très glamifique!
Everyone's saying your new look is pretty good. Just rememberNo matter how much you change, you're still the I love, . Awwwww

You took a lot of pictures yesterday. We need to do a photo shoot sometime!I'm going to need LOTS of pictures to choose from for my first album cover.And they might even inspire me to write a song for that album! I'm free whenever, .
